programme.title: What We Do for Love
programme.desc: When Sophie secures a job at the famous mediation and wellness firm, she dives headfirst into her new role; she finds herself at odds with the company's chief life coach Jason Sharpe, who is the son of the firm's president.

programme.desc: A perennially single dating coach attempts to seduce a prince as she helps him navigate the cut-throat NYC dating scene.

programme.desc: Becks, a romance columnist, decides to help her best friend, Casey, find his first love.

programme.desc: Sparks fly when popular radio host Kathy Rae and carefree tech entrepreneur John Reed are paired by his new dating app live on air.
